name: SA Forums Improvements - Classic Colours
description:
Some basic improvements and polish for the SomethingAwful Forums:
  • Gives the page a a maximum width of 1120px
  • Adds subtle gradients to the blue table headers
  • Removes link underlines in some places to prevent clutter
  • Removes the "cute pet pictures" from the top section of each page
additional_info: 2013/01/05: Implemented spanky the dolphin's excellent page nav buttons. 2013/01/04: Improved shadowing on thread OP's username. 2013/01/02: Fixed spoiler tag background colour. Improved rounded corners and horizontal padding on the buttons at the bottom of posts. Thanks The Dave. 2012/12/31: Corrected some colour issues with new default forum style, fixed new widths.
